text:
@MiaFarrow #InThisTogether 
The only way to stop the spread & transmission of the #CoronavirusPandemic is to continue with #HandHygiene #WearAMask #SocialDistance  & following #PublicHealthAdvice everywhere. At home here in Ireland ☘ In the US, in Europe & Globally. 🌍 #WeareOneForMe
